heading: rockin' in the web world
subheading: jupiter communications' plug.in conference begins monday in new york. the underlying question: just where is this crazy net music thing going? by chris oakes.
author: chris oakes
text: while a million questions remain unanswered, things are changing fast in the music industry. just last thursday, for example, virgin megastores launched a plan to blast selected internet music into its many branches. shoppers will be able to pick and choose from a selection of tunes they hear at a listening kiosk, and walk out with a cd full of net tracks.it was a small announcement with big implications.read wired news' ongoing net music coverage
